column5: Just want to confirm what zone is Bayfront Park, Zone 16 or Zone 20 ?  Thanks.
Happy Easter everyone. Eat hearty and keep your stick on the ice. TTYL

Thanks man, you too! Bayfront park is where I launch the boat every year for the spring tune up. It has the best free ramp, docking, and boat/trailer parking that you will find. A great facility and one of the few examples of a government doing something right that you will find! I will also be fishing it this year to get to use the new bait caster along Burlington's shoreline. Jim
I agree bud, love going down there even if its for an hour or two. 10-15 min drive from my home. Love it. Have a good one.
Any ice or open water?  Thanks!
You mean, how's it down there now? I'm sure it should be open water by now. Been a week or so since I've been there.
2 or 3 days ago, still about 50 feet of ice left in boat launch area.

there is still some ice, as of Fri am. Edge was okay for guys like us in our yaks to get through. Might be a little wider opening after yesterday's sun. But agreed is a very nice facility for launch and parking.
I was there on Friday still some ice but saw a guy plow thru it in a small boat.
Hi there,  Any ice left in the Bayfront park? would like to try one more time for ice fishing this Saturday!  Thanks in advance!
lasalle is wide open, as is the harbour west launch. been in the harbour fishing for 3 weeks now...pike are now closed....
Hi all. I'm still not sure what can be fished out of Bayfront as of today being Apr 2nd ?
